revision.text:
The SBGN mailing lists are where questions are asked and the latest developments discussed. There are different lists for different purposes and aspects of the SBGN effort. === For End-Users === {| ! width="250" | List ! Archive ! Info/sign-up |- | sbgn-discuss
An open mailing list for discussing the Systems Biology Graphical Notation. | align="center" | [https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/sbgn-discuss sbgn-discuss archive]
[https://lists.caltech.edu/pipermail/sbgn-discuss/ (old sbgn-discuss archive)] | align="center" | [https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/sbgn-discuss subscription page] |- | sbgn-announce
An announcement-only mailing list for the community at large. | align="center" | [http://sourceforge.net/mailarchive/forum.php?forum_name=sbgn-announce sbgn-announce archive] | align="center" | [https://lists.sourceforge.net/lists/listinfo/sbgn-announce subscription page] |} === For Developers === {| ! width="250" | List ! Archive ! Info/sign-up |- | sbgn-libsbgn
An open mailing list for discussing the development of an API library for SBGN. | align="center" | [http://sourceforge.net/mailarchive/forum.php?forum_name=sbgn-libsbgn sbgn-libsbgn archive] | align="center" | [https://lists.sourceforge.net/lists/listinfo/sbgn-libsbgn subscription page] |- | sbgn-svn-commit
Automatic broadcast-only list receiving mail whenever a change is committed to the SVN repository. | align="center" | [http://sourceforge.net/mailarchive/forum.php?forum_name=sbgn-svn-commit sbgn-svn-commit archive] | align="center" | [https://lists.sourceforge.net/lists/listinfo/sbgn-svn-commit subscription page] |} === VIP Area === {| ! width="250" | List ! Archive ! Info/sign-up |- | sbgn-editors
A private mailing list for the SBGN Editors to discuss SBGN development, planning, event organization, and other matters. | align="center" | [http://sourceforge.net/mailarchive/forum.php?forum_name=sbgn-editors sbgn-editors archive] | align="center" | |- | sbgn-editors-all
A private mailing list for all the SBGN Editors, past an present, in order to discuss specific issues that require editor experience. | align="center" | [http://sourceforge.net/mailarchive/forum.php?forum_name=sbgn-editors-all sbgn-editors-all archive] | align="center" | |- | sbgn-scicom
A private mailing list for the SBGN Scientific Committee to discuss SBGN development, endorsement and support. | align="center" | [http://sourceforge.net/mailarchive/forum.php?forum_name=sbgn-scicom sbgn-scicom archive] | align="center" | |}
